definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Therefore, Sigma become the well-known experimental furnace brands.
sentences.chinese: 因此，西格馬成爲國內知名的實驗電爐品牌企業。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt should be familiar with the limitations of benchmarking.
sentences.chinese: 六西格馬黑帶應該熟悉標杆的侷限性。

sentences.english: The Six Sigma Black Belt should be able to make the business case for attempting to accomplish these goals.
sentences.chinese: 六西格馬黑帶應該能夠爲完成這些目標提供業務案例。
